sentences.sentence: The mall was like a burlap bag to me. I didn't want to be in it.
sentences.translation: 对我来说，购物商场就像是一个麻布袋，我不想被套在里面。

sentences.sentence: Floral cloth from flour sacks replaced the burlap-bag curtains covering the grimy window.
sentences.translation: 他用从面粉袋子上剪下来的花布做成窗帘，换下了原来挂在肮脏不堪的窗户上的粗麻布口袋。

sentences.sentence: I have all but the straps done on another one for her just because. And I made myself this burlap one as well.
sentences.translation: 我还给我女儿做了一个就只差带子还没缝上了，我又给自己做了一个麻的。
